description:
This is a perfect video.
Dominic and Zack are both pros, and this video was shot basically in real time, in fact, I had to shorten it and rely on the old cross-fade to get this video in at around 20 minutes.
Pretty proud of the editing on this one, (do you guys pay attention to this?) and Dominic and Zack made it easy as the two went at like dogs in heat and moved in sync like two ballroom dancers.
If you like uncut cock, this video should be right up your alley. I put these two together because they complemented each other. Dominic has the rough and tough thing going, while Zack has youthful innocence goin' on.
My favorite part of this video is the bust sequence. Once again both guys claimed they could cum at the same time, and the gauntlet was thrown down. The intensity is freakin HIGH, and I love the look on Zack's face when frantically tries to play catchup, busting mere seconds after Dominic. You might be looking at their cocks when they cum, but you have to watch all the subtle challenge and expressions as they ramp up to the final blow.
If you download one video on this site, this is the one to get!
title: Dominic Pacifico & Zack Randall - Wrapped
